nodes.bodyText: Should it be plural, i.e. "search sources..."?
I only see this twice, but might be nice to have a helper function for generating the plugin keys

I don't think this is necessary. In this particular case it just so happen that it's the same, but it could very well be different depending on whether later on we will add different things to the source vs target (such as driver version info, etc.)
Are there any types we already have or could add for artifacts and plugins?
Actually I see you do have types below in utilities - can we use them here?
types as in an interface? this is a function arguments signature, so all of these properties are string and expected to be in certain order

Right! I think I meant interfaces for plugins and artifacts (and you are right that it wouldn't actually change anything here, my bad). You addressed the question of adding interfaces in another PR, I think, so totally fine to ignore this rather confusing and poorly worded comment.
Maybe add a comment about where the scroll amount is coming from?
